page.title: 03ILKESTON COMMUNITY HOSPITAL
page.content: The new{Ilkeston community Hospital} will be completed by January 1987. It is being built to replace Ilkeston Hospital which is over a 100 years old. The new hospital is being built about half a mile from the old one on {Heanor Road.} The hospital will have{92 beds}and will be very well equipped with lots of new equipment. It will also have an {X Ray department}and an{operating {theatre}where minor operations will be performed. It is hoped that{20 local doctors and {105 nurses}will work at the hospital. All the staff from the old hospital will be transferred, but some{new jobs will be created. The total cost of the project is going to be around{7.5 million pounds.
